original: GRÖNKVIST, Gustaf Hilmer, Direktör, Lund, f V Vingåker 11/2 75 av skom.mäst G A G o Lina Lundström, gm Anna Carlson. Priv.stud mm. Anst Krooks bokhdl Vingåker 89—92, C A Rohloffs bokhdl Örebro 92—01, sed. 01 i Gleerupska Univ.bokhdln Lund (gr 1826, AB 10), vkst dir sed. 30 samt v. styr.ordf. Juryman sed. 37. Styr.led Sv Bokhdlfrns Skånekr o suppl i centr.styr, styr.led Frn Det gamla Lund, v. ordf Minnesfdn i Lund. Resor: Norge, Danm, Tyskl, Schweiz, Ital, Belg, Holl, Engl, Frankr, Österr, Palest, Syr, Egypt, Tripolis uppr ggr 06—38. Av trycket: Hans Johan Falkman, En tidsbild fr Säfstaholms glansdagar, 32, Johan Fredrik Bahr o hans beskr ö V Vingåker, 32, art i tidn o tidskr. PatrstGM, Rotary (pres 41—42). Hobbies: Mynt o medaljer, Vingåker, resor.
translated: GRÖNKVIST, Gustaf Hilmer, Director, Lund, b Vingåker 11/2 75, son of shoemaker G.A.G. and Lina Lundström, m. Anna Carlson. Private studies and more. Employed at Krooks bookstore Vingåker 89-92, C.A. Rohloffs bookstore Örebro 92-01, since 01 at Gleerupska University bookstores Lund (graduated 1826, AB 10), managing director since 30 and vice chairman of the board. Juryman since 37. Board member of the Swedish Booksellers' Skåne chapter and substitute in the central board, board member of Från Det gamla Lund, vice chair of the Lund Memorials Foundation. Travels: Norway, Denmark, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, Belgium, the Netherlands, England, France, Austria, Palestine, Syria, Egypt, Tripoli established in 06-38. Published works: Hans Johan Falkman, En tidsbild fr Säfstaholms glansdagar, 32, Johan Fredrik Bahr and his description of Vingåker, 32, articles in newspapers and magazines. Member of PatrstGM, Rotary (president 41-42). Hobbies: Coins and medals, Vingåker, traveling.

publication.name: Hans Johan Falkman, En tidsbild fr Säfstaholms glansdagar
Johan Fredrik Bahr and his description of Vingåker
